statements: UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE player_feedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback_date = '2022-01-20 08:00:00' WHERE game_id = 100 AND player_id = 10;
UPDATE player_feedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback_text = 'Great game!', feedback_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = 1001 AND player_id = 2001 AND game_id = 3001;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Enjoyed the gameplay.', rating = 3.8 WHERE player_id = 2002 AND feedback_id = 1002 AND game_id = 3002;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game!' WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'This game is amazing!' WHERE game_id = 456 AND reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game!', rating = 5 WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456;
UPDATE GameReviews SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', rating = 4, review_text = 'Nice gameplay' WHERE game_id = 456 AND review_id = 789;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, loved it!', rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE GameReviews SET review_text = 'Not impressed with the game, needs more improvements.', rating = 2, review_date = NOW() WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great game overall' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Enjoyed the gameplay mechanics' WHERE game_id = 45678;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Adventure' WHERE game_id = 10;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, review_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE game_id = 3 AND player_id = 1;
UPDATE Feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, highly recommend!' WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Reviews SET review_rating = 5, review_text = 'Awesome gameplay and graphics' WHERE review_id = '98765432-abcdef-9876-5432-abcdef987654';
UPDATE Feedback SET feedback_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent game!', player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE feedback_id = 'a8194be2-2e2d-4e8f-b1d6-9a754b9ec140';
UPDATE Reviews SET review_text = 'Not my favorite game.', review_rating = 3, player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE review_id = 'b8194be2-2e2d-4e8f-b1d6-9a754b9ec140';
